name: Calm before the Storm (euremne, PepijnVerhaert, JochenR, dawndelirus, KillianVermeer)
name_original: Calm before the Storm (euremne, PepijnVerhaert, JochenR, dawndelirus, KillianVermeer)
description:
Welcome to the famous paper theatre, take place to witness, or would I say, take part in our exclusive show: Calm before the storm. Star in it with 3 or fewer friends and try to fish for as long as possible without falling in the water, which will be fatal!

Fishing will be pretty peaceful, allowing you to enjoy the nice weather at sea but beware of the storm, where ocean creatures go wild and will aggressively try making you fall to certain death.

Don’t worry too much about dying though, cause in this game life after death IS a thing. Get reincarnated as a seagull and stop other players from scoring or avenge your death by making them fall into the hostile waters.

  Take a look at the  controls for the best playing experience:
